backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing chatroom backend with access control, blob storage, HTTP outcalls, and CRUD operations for chatrooms, messages, user profiles, reactions, and active users with password-protected deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four requirements: adding Giphy tab to media button, removing video tab, removing X posts tab, and skipping authentication for Giphy functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, chat UI, message handling, media embedding, profile management, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload, Giphy search with trending fallback, or removal, with debounced search and request tracking to prevent race conditions.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list filtering out Creator messages without media, reply functionality, and auto-scroll on new messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog component for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL options (image, YouTube, Twitch, Twitter). Handles file uploads with progress tracking and Twitter embed preview rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views. Includes character limit progress indicator for username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter), voice playback, pin/unpin functionality, and reply features. Handles reaction management and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, image upload, Giphy search, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text. Includes character limit tracking and media preview functionality.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) in an iframe with an unpin button, rendered at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, duration tracking, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates until the specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: React hook that purges stale or empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, ensuring the lobby always loads correctly on first page load. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, filtering by category, creating/deleting chatrooms, sending messages, and managing reactions. Handles username/userId persistence and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-optimized viewport handling, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GiphyGif objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM snapshotting, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage, with filtering and bulk delete capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom with loading states, error handling, and view count tracking. Renders ChatArea component once chatroom data is loaded and actor is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that lists all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering. Includes create chatroom dialog and handles actor connection recovery.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes, features, and requirements including URL auto-detection for embeds, Giphy integration, and lowercase category tag styling.
